comment: If you live in metropolitan/downtown of large cities, please make sure you VOTE EARLY, have a few weeks food/water stored. Not trying to be a concernfagor cause panic, just be ready <3 POTUS is in complete control and looks like proofs coming /3. God bless the USA!!! WILL be GLORIOUS!
